text: @Yamiche Poinitless, rambling, incoherent BS from @realDonaldTrump EVERY SINGLE DAY with these so-called “press briefings”! Can we just STOP pretending there’s any useful information regarding #COVID19 coming from Trump...it’s just all grievances and lies day after day!
